explanation: [0-0] Two men are in front of a table covered with a red cloth, on which there is a small brown bottle. One man is wearing blue and pointing at the screen with his left hand, while the other man, dressed in black, is looking at his finger.

[0-10] Then, the man in blue presses his finger on the top of the small brown bottle and pushes it down to the right with a happy expression, while the man in black makes a disdainful expression. The man in black straightens the small brown bottle, presses down on the bottle mouth, and pushes it to the left, causing the bottle to stand upright automatically. He repeats the action, and the bottle stands upright again. The man in blue covers his mouth and laughs, while the man in black angrily throws the small brown bottle away.
